section.p: The cursed sword is securely stuck to your hand. You must fight with it in every battle until you manage to remove the curse. The curse will vanish automatically the next time you enter a temple. (Shrines and monasteries don’t count; it must be a building specifically described as a temple.) [The option to lift this curse will be available as an extra choice, listed as: Remove the curse --Ed]
There is one bit of good news: when the curse is lifted, the weapon will become a sword (COMBAT +2). Now .
